         dtypes=types, shapes=shapes, shared_name=shared_name)

body:
Apologies: I should have noticed this before.  The code is `x * 1 / y`, but should be simplified to `x / y`.  Also, please fix the formatting to

```
full = (math_ops.cast(math_ops.maximum(0, queue.size() - min_after_dequeue),
                      dtypes.float32) / (capacity - min_after_dequeue))
```
